articles.title: Indian-Origin Hirsh Vardhan Singh Announces 2024 US Presidential Bid - NDTV
articles.description: Hirsh Vardhan Singh, an Indian-American engineer, has announced his bid for the White House, becoming the third person of Indian descent  to join the Republican candidates vying to become the US President in 2024.
articles.content:
Hirsh Varhdan Singh officially filed his candidacy with the Federal Election Commission. (File)

articles.author: Heather Law, Aaron Pellish
articles.title: American nurse and child kidnapped in Haiti - CNN
articles.description: An American nurse and her child have been kidnapped in Haiti, according to El Roi Haiti, the Christian humanitarian aid organization she works for.
articles.content:
An American nurse and her child have been kidnapped in Haiti, according to El Roi Haiti, the Christian humanitarian aid organization she works for.
